name: adminplus-boilerplate-npm
description: Basic boilerplate using AdminPlus Lite and Bootstrap Layout

scripts.copy-vendor: copyfiles -f node_modules/bootstrap-layout/dist/* node_modules/bootstrap-layout-scrollable/dist/* node_modules/simplebar/dist/* node_modules/adminplus/dist/* node_modules/bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.min.js node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js node_modules/tether/dist/js/tether.min.js vendor

author: Laza Bogdan <laza.bogdan@macro-net.ro>
